Normal wolves always hunt at maximum intensity (theta=1), but you can choose differently.

I chose this theta because the sheep population has decreased significantly, making hunting less viable at maximum intensity. By lowering my hunting intensity, I can conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves while still being able to hunt if the opportunity arises. This strategy helps ensure my survival in a challenging environment.
